content: the **sirat beanie** is knitted top down and in the round it features a simple motif made from purls and knits after shaping the crown you knit the beanie following the chart until you reach the brim which is created with 1x1 ribbing it is a quick and relaxing piece of work with a nice texture that you will certainly enjoy wearing **size** one size adult intended to fit head circumference of 56-60 cm / 22-23 7 **yarn** 115 m / 125 yds / 75 g of cyrano by de rerum natura 100% wool 150 m / 164 yds - 100 g colorway brouillard or approx 115 m / 125 yds of aran weight yarn for yarn substitution you can hold several yarns together **needles** 4 5 mm / us 7 circular needles for the main part or size needed to achieve gauge 4 mm / us 6 needle for the ribbing **gauge** 16 sts x 28
